description: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)

entry: Sets up a boilerplate R package.

description: Imported packages (separated by ,[[:space:]]). Versions can be specified inside a parenthesis. For example, ggplot2 (>= 3.2.1), dplyr (>= 0.8.4)
Suggested packages. Same format as Imports.
Roxygen options. For example, list(markdown = TRUE) enables markdown.
